{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ASUS DSL-AC68U.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Dual-Band Wireless-AC1900 Gigabit ADSL/VDSL Modem Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networking/DSLAC68U/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_DSL-AC68U |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = DSL-AC68U |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4708A0;BCM4708A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 |cpu2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7510; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = 650 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = Serial(SPI) |fla2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = ESMT;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |ram2type = DDR2 |ram2size = 64 |ram2chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = CFE;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36.4;brcmarm;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.75 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+, VDSL2, AiCloud support, RJ-11 |addchip = xDSL AFE;MediaTek;MT7550; ,,, xDSL LD;MediaTek;MT7555; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = FreshTomato, Gnuton
|availability = limited distribution |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/01/2013 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 886227639809 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00MMMO9M4 |asin_country = DE |asin2 = B00O27PHGY |asin_country2 = UK |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is also known as the '''''DSL-AC68R'''''. <!-- {{WiFiCert|WFA19421|08/29/2013}} -> CE :This certification also applies to the ''RT-AC68R'' -->
===Additional specifications=== * '''Processor''' :Router/WiFi: [[Broadcom]] BCM4708+2xBCM4360 @800MHz Dual Core :xDSL/Modem: [[MediaTek]] MT7510 @650MHz * '''Memory''' :WiFi/Router: 128MB NAND Flash/256MB DDR3 RAM :xDSL/Modem: 8MB SPI Flash/64MB DDR2 RAM * '''Firmware''' :Linux kernel: 2.6.36.4 (brcmarm) * '''Product segment''': AC1900 (1300+600 Mbps) * '''Antenna''': 3x detachable antenna * '''Ports''': USB: 1x USB 3.0 :xDSL: 1x xDSL (RJ11) :LAN: 4x GbE (RJ45) 10/100/1000 Base-T * '''Power Adapter''' :ASUS Part #AD890326 :AC Input: 100~240VAC 0.8A (50/60Hz) :DC Output: 19VDC 1.75A *'''Dimensions''' (W x H x D): [[Dimensions::220 mm x 160 mm x 83.3 mm]] *'''Weight:''' [[Weight::640 g]]
==Links of Interest== * [https://www.asus.com/us/Networking-IoT-Servers/Modem-Routers/All-series/DSLAC68U/ '''<big>Official Product Page</big>'''] ''on '''ASUS U.S.''''' * [https://www.asus.com/US/supportonly/DSL-AC68U/HelpDesk/ '''<big>Official Product Support Page</big>'''] ''on '''ASUS U.S.'''''

=== Reviews === * [https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/asus-dsl-ac68u-ac1900-vdsl-router '''Asus DSL-AC68U Router Review'''] ''on '''TrustedReviews''''' * [https://www.pctekreviews.com/Reviews/DSL_AC68U.aspx '''Asus DSL-AC68U Modem/Router Review'''] ''on '''PC TeK Reviews'''''
=== Forum threads === * [https://forums.whirlpool.net.au/thread/36vrmjl3 '''ASUS DSL-AC68U AC1900 modem router''' thread series] ''on '''Whirlpool Forums''''': Parts [https://forums.whirlpool.net.au/thread/36vrmjl3 '''One'''], [https://forums.whirlpool.net.au/thread/9l2mjx69 '''Two'''] and [https://forums.whirlpool.net.au/thread/9p24k219 '''Three'''] * [https://forums.overclockers.co.uk/threads/anyone-using-an-asus-dsl-ac68u.18606945/ '''Anyone Using an Asus DSL-AC68U?'''] ''on '''Overclockers UK''''' * [https://forum.kitz.co.uk/index.php/topic,14399.0.html '''ASUS DSL-AC68U (VDSL modem/router)'''] ''on '''Kitz Forum'''''

==See also== * ASUS DSL-AC51 • Official [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Modem-Routers/All-series/DSL-AC51/ '''Product Page'''] and [https://www.asus.com/supportonly/DSL-AC51/HelpDesk/ '''Support Page'''] on ''ASUS Global'' * [[ASUS DSL-AC52U]] * ASUS DSL-AC55U • Official [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Modem-Routers/All-series/DSL-AC55U/ '''Product Page'''] and [https://www.asus.com/supportonly/DSL-AC55U/HelpDesk/ '''Support Page'''] on ''ASUS Global'' * [[ASUS DSL-AC56U]] • Official [https://www.asus.com/supportonly/RT-AC56U/HelpDesk/ '''Support Page'''] on ''ASUS Global'' * [[ASUS DSL-AC87VG]] • Official [https://www.asus.com/us/SupportOnly/DSL-AC87VG/HelpDesk/ '''Support Page'''] on ''ASUS U.S.'' * [[ASUS DSL-AC88U]] • Official [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Modem-Routers/All-series/DSL-AC88U/ '''Product Page'''] and [https://www.asus.com/us/supportonly/DSL-AC88U/HelpDesk/ '''Support Page'''] on ''ASUS Global'' and ''ASUS U.S.'', respectively * ASUS DSL-AC750 • Official [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Modem-Routers/All-series/DSL-AC750/ '''Product Page'''] and [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Modem-Routers/All-series/DSL-AC750/HelpDesk/ '''Support Page'''] on ''ASUS Global'' * [[ASUS DSL-AC3100]] • Official [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Modem-Routers/All-series/DSL-AC3100/ '''Product Page'''] and [https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/Modem-Routers/All-series/DSL-AC3100/HelpDesk/ '''Support Page'''] on ''ASUS Global''
